title: Garden , plants and flowers : quarterly purchase spend in the UK 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Expenditure in million GBP in the y axis.
The Expenditure in million GBP is highest at Quarter Q3 2018 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.
Quarter Q3 2018 has 1.64 times more Expenditure in million GBP than Quarter Q3 2013 which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 26 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Expenditure in million GBP in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2018 has the highest Expenditure in million GBP and Q3 2013 has the lowest Expenditure in million GBP.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Expenditure in million GBP in the y axis.
The Expenditure in million GBP is highest at Quarter Q3 2018 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.
Quarter Q3 2018 has 1.64 times more Expenditure in million GBP than Quarter Q3 2013 which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Expenditure in million GBP in the y axis.
The maximum Expenditure in million GBP 1484.0 is found at Quarter Q3 2018 and the minimum is found at Q3 2013 where Expenditure in million GBP is 903.0.
The difference of Expenditure in million GBP between the highest and lowest Quarter is 581.0.
Expenditure in million GBP at Quarter Q3 2018 is 1484.0 , second place is  at 1471.0, and thirdly is Q1 2019 at 1480.0.
Overall Expenditure in million GBP has lowered over the Quarters.
The Quarter Q3 2013 has 1.22 times less Expenditure in million GBP than average.
